title: Adidas scores against Nike in World Cup deals
text:
Adidas scores against Nike in World Cup deals 7:42am BST - 01:18
Adidas can declare itself the winner over arch rival Nike in the upcoming soccer World Cup even before the first match kicks off as it is kitting out the most teams. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
